description: Starter template for writing JavaScript tests for Gauge
name: boart-gauge-integration

scripts.*test:local: export runtime_environent=local && gauge run --tags="(!env:development & !env:staging | env:local) & onboarding & manual"
scripts.test:local: export runtime_environent=local && gauge run --tags="(!env:development & !env:staging | env:local) & masterdata & (md-5.5 | md-5.18 | md-5.19)"
scripts.test:local:0: export runtime_environent=local && gauge run --tags="(!env:development & !env:staging | env:local) & md-0"
scripts.test:local:onboarding: export runtime_environent=local && gauge run --tags="(!env:development & !env:staging | env:local) & onboarding & ob-10.7"
scripts.test:local:company: export runtime_environent=local && gauge run --tags="(!env:development & !env:staging | env:local) & md-1"
scripts.test:local:carrier: export runtime_environent=local && gauge run --tags="(!env:development & !env:staging | env:local) & md-3"
scripts.test:local:sync: export runtime_environent=local && gauge run --tags="(!env:development & !env:staging | env:local) & sync"
scripts.test:local:dlx: export runtime_environent=local && gauge run --tags="(!env:development & !env:staging | env:local) & md-5.20"
scripts.test:stage:onboarding: export runtime_environent=staging && gauge run --tags="(!env:local & !env:development | env:staging) & onboarding & (ob-10.5 | ob-10.6) "
scripts.update:and:test: npm run update && npm run test
